SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_gateway_record (uuid, device_id, temperature, `current`, closed_status, relay_status, short_circuits, max_current, voltage, `power`, total_battery, current_battery, battery) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{current,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{closedStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relayStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortCircuits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxCurrent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{voltage,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{power,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalBattery,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{currentBattery,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{battery,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update tb_gateway_record set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `current` = #{current,jdbcType=BIGINT}, closed_status = #{closedStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, relay_status = #{relayStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, short_circuits = #{shortCircuits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_current = #{maxCurrent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, voltage = #{voltage,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `power` = #{power,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total_battery = #{totalBattery,jdbcType=BIGINT}, current_battery = #{currentBattery,jdbcType=BIGINT}, battery = #{battery,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, uuid, device_id, temperature, `current`, closed_status, relay_status, short_circuits, max_current, voltage, `power`, total_battery, current_battery, battery, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from tb_gateway_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, uuid, device_id, temperature, `current`, closed_status, relay_status, short_circuits, max_current, voltage, `power`, total_battery, current_battery, battery, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from tb_gateway_record
